Name: Top Torch
About the game: Top Torch is a competitive game for two players sharing a single keyboard. The controls are simple and can be learned within seconds, but mastering the intricacies of flight will require much more practice. Accompanied by a neon-lit, geometric art style and a lush, musical soundscape, Top Torch is centered around superbly satisfying physics-based combat mechanics which contain tactical depth within their mechanical simplicity. It is the first public release from indie developer Colin Hopkins.
Meta Title: Top Torch: Feb 9, 2019, Colin Hopkins and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Top Torch? Check out the release date (Feb 9, 2019), developer insights from Colin Hopkins, and a complete game summary.
